title: Hurst's The Heart 12th ed. (2007)
description:
12th edition, 2007

Written by a team of international expers, Hurst's The Heart is the most comprehensive and current resource on the heart. You will find expert coveage ranging from genetics and molecular biology, epidemiology, imaging, and the social and societal origins of heart disease to patient care.
